questions.question: What is the process of training a machine learning model using example data called?
Which algorithm is commonly used for classification tasks in machine learning?
What does the term 'overfitting' refer to in machine learning?
options: Model performing well on training data but poorly on new data
Model capturing noise along with underlying patterns
Model being too simple to capture patterns
Model being biased towards certain data points
questions.correct_answer: Model capturing noise along with underlying patterns

questions.question: Which evaluation metric is commonly used for regression problems in machine learning?
What is the purpose of regularization in machine learning?
